member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpException
member.summary: These are the exceptions the FlacLibSharp library produces.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new FlacLibSharp exception.
member.param: A clear description of the issue.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpInvalidFormatException
member.summary: This exception is raised when you try to load an invalid flac file.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpInvalidFormatException.Details
member.summary: Technical details on what exactly has gone wrong.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpInvalidFormatException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new exception.
member.param: Technical details on what exactly has gone wrong.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpInvalidPaddingBitCount
member.summary: Exception thrown when a padding block of metadata was set to an invalid bit length.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpInvalidPaddingBitCount.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Exception.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpMaxTrackIndicesExceededException
member.summary: This exception is raised when too many index points are added to a CueSheet Track.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpMaxTrackIndicesExceededException.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an exception to indicate that too many index points have been added to a CueSheet Track.
member.param: How many index points that are allowed.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpMaxTracksExceededException
member.summary: This exception is raised when too many tracks are added to a CueSheet.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpMaxTracksExceededException.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new exception indicating there are too many tracks added to a CueSheet.
member.param: How many tracks that are allowed.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpSaveNotSupportedException
member.summary: This exception is raised when you try to load an invalid flac file.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpSaveNotSupportedException.Details
member.summary: Technical details on what exactly has gone wrong.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpSaveNotSupportedException.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new exception indicating a flac file could not be saved.
member.param: Technical details on what exactly has gone wrong.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpStreamInfoMissing
member.summary: Exception raised when a Flac file was loaded that didn't contain the stream info.
member.remarks: Stream Info is the only metadata block that is mandatory.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Exceptions.FlacLibSharpStreamInfoMissing.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new FlacLibSharpStreamInfoMissing.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac
member.summary: Wrapper class for easy access to some of the Flac functions

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetMetaData(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all available metadata in the flac file.
member.param: Path to the file.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetStreamInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the StreamInfo metadata.
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: The StreamInfo metadata or null if no StreamInfo metadata is found.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetVorbisComment(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the vorbis comment metadata (ID3V2 tags).
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: The vorbis comment metadata or null if none is available.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetVorbisField(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specific vorbis field name (example = ARTIST) if it is available.
member.param: Path to the file.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetArtist(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first artist of the track.
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: Empty string if the track number isn't specified in the metadata.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first title of the track.
member.returns: Empty string if the track number isn't specified in the metadata.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetAlbum(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first album name.
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: Empty string if the track number isn't specified in the metadata.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetTrackNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first track number.
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: Empty string if the track number isn't specified in the metadata.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetGenre(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the first genre of the track.
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: Empty string if no genre is specified in the metadata.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FastFlac.GetDuration(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the duration of the track in seconds.
member.param: Path to the file.
member.returns: The duration of the track in seconds or 0 if the duration is not known (sample count is missing from streaminfo metadata).

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile
member.summary: Parses FLAC data from the given Stream or file.
member.remarks: Only metadata parsing is supported, audio is not decoded.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a flac file.
member.param: Path to the file.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Opens a flac file from a stream of data.
member.param: Any stream of data
member.remarks: Stream is assumed to be at the beginning of the FLAC data.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.Metadata
member.summary: List of all the available metadata.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.Initialize
member.summary: Verifies the flac identity and loads the available metadata blocks.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.VerifyFlacIdentity
member.summary: Looks for the magic fLaC marker and positions the stream to start reading right after it, any data before the marker is ignored.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.ReadMetadata
member.summary: Parses all the metadata blocks available in the file.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.StreamInfo
member.summary: Returns the StreamInfo metedata of the loaded Flac file.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.ApplicationInfo
member.summary: Returns the first ApplicationInfo metadata of the loaded Flac file or null if this data is not available.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.GetAllApplicationInfo
member.summary: Returns all ApplicationInfo metadata, if there is any.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.VorbisComment
member.summary: Returns the VorbisComment metadata of the loaded Flac file or null if this data is not available.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.CueSheet
member.summary: Returns the CueSheet metadata of the loaded Flac file or null if this data is not available.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.GetAllCueSheets
member.summary: Returns all CueSheet metadata, if there is any.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.SeekTable
member.summary: Returns the SeekTable metadata of the loaded Flac file or null if this data is not available.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.Padding
member.summary: Returns the Padding metadata of the loaded Flac file or null if this data is not available.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.GetAllPadding
member.summary: Returns all Padding metadata, if there is any.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.GetAllPictures
member.summary: Will return all Picture metadata, if there is any.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.Save
member.summary: Writes the metadata back to the flacfile, overwriting the original file.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FlacFile.Dispose
member.summary: Closes the Flac file.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper
member.summary: A helper class for parsing bytes and bits to actual numbers.
member.remarks: Currently always operates with Big-Endian numbers, because this was created for FLAC parsing which uses big-endian by default.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetDataSubset(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a subset of items in a deep copied array.
member.param: The input data (won't be altered)
Where in the input data to start copying files.
The amount of bytes to copy.
member.returns: A new array with a copy of the subset of data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetUInt16(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads an unsigned 16 bit integer starting from the offset.
member.param: The source data
Offset from where to start reading the integer, in bytes.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetUInt24(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads an unsigned 24 bit integer starting from the offset.
member.param: The source data
Offset from where to start reading the integer, in bytes.
member.returns: The number that was read (it reads 24 bits, but the actual type will be a 32 bit integer).

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetUInt32(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads an unsigned 32 bit integer starting from the offset.
member.param: The source data
Offset from where to start reading the integer, in bytes.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetUInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads an unsigned 64 bit integer starting from the offset.
member.param: The source data
Offset from where to start reading the integer, in bytes.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetBoolean(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads boolean at the offset.
member.param: The source data
Offset from where to start reading the boolean, in bytes.
In the found byte, defines the bit that will represent the boolean.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetUInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads an integer value starting from the offset.
member.param: The source data
Offset from where to start reading the integer, in bytes.
How many bits to read (16, 32, or something arbitrary but less than or equal to 64)

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetUInt64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Interprets part of a byte array as a number.
member.param: The source data.
Where in the data to start reading (offset in bytes)
How many bits to read (16, 32, or something arbitrary but less than or equal to 64)
In the first byte, at which bit to start reading the data from.
member.remarks: Always assumes Big-Endian in the data store.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetBytesUInt16(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Converts the given value to a big-endian byte stream.
member.param: The value to convert.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetBytesUInt32(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Converts the given value to a big-endian byte stream.
member.param: The value to convert.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetBytesUInt64(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Converts the given value to a big-endian byte stream.
member.param: The value to convert.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetBytes(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts the given value to a big-endian byte stream.
member.param: The value to convert.
How many bytes to convert (the rest will be ignored in the value).

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.GetPaddedAsciiBytes(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Will return an array of ascii printable characters (values 0x20 to 0x7e) and will pad with zero's so that the array of bytes is always of a given size.
member.param: The text to convert to bytes.
The total length of the resulting byte array.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Helpers.BinaryDataHelper.SwitchEndianness(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: For a given array of bytes, switch the endiannes of the length-bytes starting at byteOffset.
member.param: The source data.
Where to start switching the endianness.
How many bytes to switch.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.ApplicationInfo
member.summary: An application specific block of data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.ApplicationInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty ApplicationInfo block.
member.remarks: Application id will be 0, application data will be empty.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.ApplicationInfo.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Parses the given binary metadata to an ApplicationInfo block

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.ApplicationInfo.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.ApplicationInfo.ApplicationID
member.summary: The application ID of the application for which the data is intended

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.ApplicationInfo.ApplicationData
member.summary: The additional data

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet
member.summary: This block stores various information for use in a cue sheet.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Parses the binary metadata from the flac file into a CueSheet object.
member.param: The binary data from the flac file.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.MediaCatalog
member.summary: Gets or sets the media catalog number.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.LeadInSampleCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of lead-in samples, this field is only relevant for CD-DA cuesheets.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.IsCDCueSheet
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the cuesheet corresponds to a Compact Disc.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.TrackCount
member.summary: The number of tracks.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.Tracks
member.summary: All Tracks in the cuesheet.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheet.CalculateMetaDataBlockLength
member.summary: Calculates the total Block Length of this metadata block, for use in the Header.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack
member.summary: TODO: A single track in the cuesheet.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Initialize the CueSheetTrack.
member.param: The full data array.
Where the cuesheet track begins.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data representing this CueSheet track to the given stream.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.TrackOffset
member.summary: Offset of a track.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.TrackNumber
member.summary: Number of the track.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.ISRC
member.summary: The ISRC of the track.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.IsAudioTrack
member.summary: Indicates whether or not this is an audio track.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.IsPreEmphasis
member.summary: The Pre Emphasis flag.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.IsLeadOut
member.summary: Checks whether or not the track is a lead-out track (meaning track number is either 170 or 255, depending on CD-DA or not)

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.IndexPointCount
member.summary: Number of track index points. There must be at least one index in every track in a CUESHEET except for the lead-out track, which must have zero. For CD-DA, this number may be no more than 100.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrack.IndexPoints
member.summary: All of the index points in the cue sheet track.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackCollection
member.summary: A set of Cue Sheet Tracks

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndex
member.summary: One index in a Cue Sheet Track.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndex.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Cue Sheet Track Index.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndex.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Cue Sheet Track Index based on the binary data provided.
member.param: Where in the data array to start reading.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndex.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data representing this CueSheet track index point to the given stream.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndex.Offset
member.summary: Offset in samples, relative to the track offset, of the index point. For CD-DA, the offset must be evenly divisible by 588 samples (588 samples = 44100 samples/sec * 1/75th of a sec). Note that the offset is from the beginning of the track, not the beginning of the audio data.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndex.IndexPointNumber
member.summary: The index point number. For CD-DA, an index number of 0 corresponds to the track pre-gap. The first index in a track must have a number of 0 or 1, and subsequently, index numbers must increase by 1. Index numbers must be unique within a track.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.CueSheetTrackIndexCollection
member.summary: A set of cue sheet track indexes.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlock
member.summary: The abstract base class for all meta data blocks.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlock.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty metadata block

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlock.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, loads the given type of metadata from the data provided.
member.param: The data where to find the metadata block in.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlock.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlock.Create(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads the first meta data block found on the stream (first byte is supposed to be the start of the meta data block)... the stream will be forwarded to the start of the next meta data block (or the start of the audio frames)

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlock.Header
member.summary: Each metadata block has a header, defining its type among other things.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader
member.summary: A metadata block header.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType
member.summary: Defines the type of meta data.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.None
member.summary: An unknown type of metadata.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.StreamInfo
member.summary: Information on the flac audio stream.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.Padding
member.summary: A metadata block that pads some space. It has no further meaning.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.Application
member.summary: A metadata block with application specific information.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.Seektable
member.summary: A metadata block that has some information for seektables.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.VorbisComment
member.summary: A metadata block that contains the vorbis comments (artist, field, ...)

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.CueSheet
member.summary: A metadata block containing cue sheet information.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.Picture
member.summary: A metadata block with picture information.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetadataBlockType.Invalid
member.summary: A metadata block that is not valid or could not be parsed.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new metadata block header from the provided data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.WriteHeaderData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the metadata to the given stream.
member.param: The stream where the data will be written to.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.IsLastMetaDataBlock
member.summary: Indicates if this is the last metadata block in the file (meaning that it is followed by the actual audio stream).

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.Type
member.summary: Defines what kind of metadatablock this is.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.MetaDataBlockLength
member.summary: Defines the length of the metadata block.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.MetadataBlockHeader.ParseData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Interprets the meta data block header.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Padding
member.summary: Empty space inside the flac file ... a number of meaningless bits.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Padding.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty metadata block.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Padding.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads the padding data from the given data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Padding.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Padding.EmptyBitCount
member.summary: How many empty bits there are in the padding, must be a multiple of eight.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.PictureType
member.summary: Picture type according to the ID3v2 APIC frame.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Other
member.summary: A general picture.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.FileIcon
member.summary: The picture is a file icon.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.OtherFileIcon
member.summary: The picture is another file icon.

member.summary: The picture is the front cover of an album.

member.summary: The picture is the back cover of an album.

member.summary: The picture is the leaflet page of an album.

member.summary: The picture is a media page (e.g. label of CD).

member.summary: The picture of the lead artist.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Artist
member.summary: Picture of the artist.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Conductor
member.summary: Picture of the conductor.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Band
member.summary: Picture of the band.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Composer
member.summary: picture of the composer.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Lyricist
member.summary: Picture of the Lyricist.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.RecordingLocation
member.summary: Picture of the recording location.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.DuringRecording
member.summary: Picture during the recording.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.DuringPerformance
member.summary: Picture during the performance.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.MovieScreenCapture
member.summary: A movie screen capture picture.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.BrightColouredFish
member.summary: A picture of a bright coloured fish. Yes, really ... a fish. Brightly coloured even!

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.Illustration
member.summary: A picture of an illustration.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.ArtistLogotype
member.summary: A picture of the artist logo.

member.name: F:FlacLibSharp.PictureType.StudioLogotype
member.summary: The studio logo.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.Picture
member.summary: A picture metadata block.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Picture.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads the picture data from a Metadata block.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Picture.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Picture.CalculateMetadataBlockLength
member.summary: Calculates the total size of this block, taking into account the lengths of the variable length fields.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.Picture.CalculateMetadataBlockLength(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Calculates the total size of this block, taking into account the lengths of the variable length fields.
member.remarks: If the lengths of the variable length fields are already available, use this function, otherwise use the parameterless override.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.PictureType
member.summary: What kind of picture this is.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.MIMEType
member.summary: The MIME type of the picture file.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.Description
member.summary: A description for the picture.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.Width
member.summary: Width of the picture, in pixels.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.Height
member.summary: Height of the picture, in pixels.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.ColorDepth
member.summary: The colour depth of the picture.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.Colors
member.summary: For color indexed pictures, all of the colours in the picture.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.Data
member.summary: The actual picture data in a stream.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.Picture.URL
member.summary: The URL for the image if the MIME Type indicates a URL reference (MIME Type = '-->').

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint
member.summary: A seek point in a frame.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new seekpoint.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.WriteData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data representing this SeekPoint to the given stream.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a place holder seekpoint.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.FirstSampleNumber
member.summary: Sample number of the first sample in a target frame, 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF for a placeholder point.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.ByteOffset
member.summary: Offset, in bytes, from the first byte of the first frame header to the first byte of the target frame's header.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.NumberOfSamples
member.summary: Number of samples in the target frame.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.IsPlaceHolder
member.summary: Indicates if this seekpoint is a place holder.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.ValidateIsPlaceholder
member.summary: Checks if this SeekPoint is a place holder.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint.CompareTo(FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint)
member.summary: Compares two seekpoints based on the "first sample number".

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.SeekPointCollection
member.summary: A set of seekpoints in a seektable in the form of a sorted list, because seektables have to be sorted by Sample Number.
member.remarks: There is currently an issue with this list: it only kind-of supports multiple placeholders in a weird way!

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekPointCollection.Placeholders
member.summary: Returns a counter to indicate how many placeholder seekpoints this list has. These are not actual seekpoints, because they don't really contain information (and their keys are all the same).
member.remarks: This is a rather special way to support this situation, hopefully in the future this can be changed to something more natural.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPointCollection.Add(FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint)
member.summary: Adds a new seekpoint to the collection.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekPointCollection.Remove(FlacLibSharp.SeekPoint)
member.summary: Removes a seekpoint from the collection (if found).

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.SeekTable
member.summary: A seektable.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekTable.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a new SeekTable base on the provided binary data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.SeekTable.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekTable.TotalSeekPoints
member.summary: Gets the total number of SeekPoints: normal seekpoints + placeholder seekpoints.
member.remarks: Don't use this to loop through the indexes of the SeekPoints collection! It also contains the total nr of placeholders, which are not in that collection.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.SeekTable.SeekPoints
member.summary: The seekpoints in the seektable.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo
member.summary: A metadata block that contains information on the actual stream.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new StreamInfo.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads a new stream info block from the provided data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the data describing this metadata to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.MinimumBlockSize
member.summary: The minimum block size, in samples, used in the stream.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.MaximumBlockSize
member.summary: The maximum block size, in samples, used in the stream.
member.remarks: Minimum blocksize == maximum blocksize implies a fixed-blocksize stream.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.MinimumFrameSize
member.summary: The minimum frame size, in bytes, used in the stream.
member.remarks: May be 0 to imply the value is not known.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.MaximumFrameSize
member.summary: The maximum frame size, in bytes, used in the stream.
member.remarks: May be 0 to imply the value is not known.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.SampleRateHz
member.summary: Sample rate in Hz.
member.remarks: Though 20 bits are available, the maximum sample rate is limited by the structure of frame headers to 655350Hz. A value of 0 is invalid.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.Channels
member.summary: Number of channels -1.
member.remarks: FLAC supports from 1 to 8 channels.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.BitsPerSample
member.summary: Bits per sample -1.
member.remarks: FLAC supports from 4 to 32 bits per sample. Currently the reference encoder and decoders only support up to 24 bits per sample.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.Samples
member.summary: Total samples in stream.
member.remarks: 'Samples' means inter-channel sample, i.e. one second of 44.1Khz audio will have 44100 samples regardless of the number of channels. A value of zero here means the number of total samples is unknown.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.MD5Signature
member.summary: MD5 signature (16 byte) of the unencoded audio data.
member.remarks: This allows the decoder to determine if an error exists in the audio data even when the error does not result in an invalid bitstream.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.StreamInfo.Duration
member.summary: The duration of the audio in seconds, calculated based on the stream info.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.FLACUnknownMetaDataBlock.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes the data describing this metadata block to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.VorbisCommentValues
member.summary: The value or values of a single Vorbis Comment Field.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisCommentValues.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty vorbis comment.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisCommentValues.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a vorbis comment with one value.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisCommentValues.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a vorbis comment with the given values.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.VorbisCommentValues.Value
member.summary: The first value of all values.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisCommentValues.ToString
member.summary: If the comment has at least one value, the first value is returned, otherwise an empty string.

member.name: T:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment
member.summary: A metadata block containing the "Vorbis Comment" (artist, title, ...)

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a Vorbis comment block, without any content.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.LoadBlockData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads the Vorbis from a block of data.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.WriteBlockData(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Will write the data describing this metadata to the given stream.
member.param: Stream to write the data to.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through all VorbisComments.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through all VorbisComments.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.AddComment(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a comment to the list of vorbis comments.
member.param: Comment in the format "FIELDNAME=VALUE".

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.AddComment(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a comment to the list of vorbis comments.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Vendor
member.summary: The Vendor of the Flac file.

member.name: P:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Get one of the vorbis comments.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field.
member.returns: The value of the vorbis comment field.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.ContainsField(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a field with the given key is present in the Vorbis Comment data.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field.
member.returns: True if such a field is available.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all Vorbis Comment values for the given key.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field to be removed.
member.remarks: Does nothing if no Vorbis Comments with the key are found.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Remove(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given value from the VorbisComment.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field to be removed.
member.remarks: Does nothing if no Vorbis Comments with the key are found.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new Vorbis Comment with the given key and a single value.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field to be added.
The value for this comment.
member.remarks: If a tag with the key already exists, the value is appended.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Add(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a new Vorbis Comment with the given key and a list of values.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field to be removed.
The values for this comment.
member.remarks: If a tag with the key already exists, the values are appended.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Replace(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces all the values for a given tag with the given value.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field to be replaced.
The values for this comment.

member.name: M:FlacLibSharp.VorbisComment.Replace(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Replaces all the values for a given tag with the given value.
member.param: The key of the vorbis comment field to be replaced.
The values for this comment.
